name: UpdateEnvironmentTheme
description:
Update color themes for project environments.

This tool updates the color themes of data environments within a specified project. It's useful for changing visual settings or themes in your Datadog project environments.

parameters.name: color_theme_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifying the data color theme to update.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this data color theme.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project you want to access. Obtain it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: theme_details
parameters.description: JSON object with keys: id (int), name (str), colors (str), is_global (str), created_at (str), created_by (JSON).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this data color theme.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this data color theme.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
